00009 #include "shMemory.h"
00010 
00011 #define FREE    1
00012 #define BUSY    !FREE
00013 
00014 static int freeShMems = MAX_SHMEMS;
00015 
00016 typedef struct shMem{
00017         int                             shmid;
00018         key_t                   key;
00019         int                     shMemSize;
00020         frame_t                 *shMemFrame;
00021         unsigned int    shMemP;
00022         key_t                   semid;
00023         int                             state;
00024         int                             permFlags;
00025         int                             appnProcessesAmm;
00026         pid_t                   appnProcessesPids[MAX_SHMAPPN];
00027 }shMem_t;
00028 
00029 static shMem_t shMemories[MAX_SHMEMS];
00030 
00031 int shmget(key_t key, int size){
00032         return (int)int80(_SYS_SHMGET, (void *)key, (void *)size, NULL);
00033 }
00034 
00035 char * shmat(int shmid, key_t *semid){
00036         return (char *)int80(_SYS_SHMAT, (void *)shmid, (void *)semid, NULL);

00039 int shmdt(int shmid){
00040         return (int)int80(_SYS_SHM_DETACH, (void *)shmid, NULL, NULL);
00041 }
00042 
00043 static void shmDestroy(int shmid){
00044         if (shMemories[shmid].state != FREE){
00045                 return;
00046         }
00047         shMemories[shmid].state = FREE;
00048         shMemories[shmid].key = -1;
00049         setFramePresence(shMemories[shmid].shMemFrame, FALSE);
00050         freeFrame(shMemories[shmid].shMemFrame);
00051         shMemories[shmid].shMemP = 0;
00052         shMemories[shmid].shMemSize = 0;
00053         sem_free(shMemories[shmid].semid);
00054         shMemories[shmid].semid = -1;
00055         ++freeShMems;
00056         
00057         return;
00058 }
00059 
00060 void initializeShMems(){
00061         int i, j;
00062         
00063         for (i = 0 ; i < MAX_SHMEMS ; ++i){
00064                 shMemories[i].shmid = i;
00065                 shMemories[i].key = -1;
00066                 shMemories[i].shMemSize = 0;
00067                 shMemories[i].shMemFrame = NULL;
00068                 shMemories[i].shMemP = 0;
00069                 shMemories[i].semid = -1;
00070                 shMemories[i].state = FREE;
00071                 shMemories[i].permFlags = (_READ | _WRITE);
00072                 shMemories[i].appnProcessesAmm = 0;
00073                 for (j = 0 ; j < MAX_SHMAPPN ; ++j){
00074                         shMemories[i].appnProcessesPids[j] = -1;
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 }

00079 int _sys_shmget(key_t key, int size){
00080         int i, freePos = -1;
00081         
00082         if (!freeShMems || size > PAGE_SIZE * PAGES_PER_FRAME){
00083                 /*puts("El tama√±o es mayor al de una pagina");*/
00084                 return -1;
00085         }
00086         
00087         for (i = 0 ; i < MAX_SHMEMS ; ++i){
00088                 if (shMemories[i].key == key){
00089                         /*puts("La key es igual");*/
00090                         return -1;
00091                 }
00092                 if (shMemories[i].state == FREE && freePos == -1){
00093                         freePos = shMemories[i].shmid;
00094                 }
00095         }
00096         
00097         if (freePos == -1){
00098                 /*puts("freepos == -1");*/
00099                 return -1;
00100         }
00101         
00102         shMemories[freePos].state = BUSY;
00103         shMemories[freePos].key = key;
00104         shMemories[freePos].shMemSize = PAGE_SIZE * PAGES_PER_FRAME;
00105         if((shMemories[freePos].shMemFrame = getFrame()) == NULL){
00106                 /*puts("Pidiendo el frame");*/
00107                 return -1;
00108         }
00109         
00110         setFramePresence(shMemories[freePos].shMemFrame, TRUE);
00111         
00112         shMemories[freePos].shMemP = shMemories[freePos].shMemFrame->address;
00113                 
00114         if ((shMemories[freePos].semid = sem_get(BLOCK)) == -1){
00115                 /*puts("creando semaforo\n");*/
00116                 return -1;
00117         }
00118         
00119         --freeShMems;
00120         
00121         return freePos;
00122 }

00124 char * _sys_shmat(int shmid, key_t *semid){
00125         int i;
00126         pid_t pid;
00127         
00128         pid = getpid();
00129         if (shmid >= MAX_SHMEMS || shMemories[shmid].state != BUSY || shMemories[shmid].key == -1 || shMemories[shmid].appnProcessesAmm >= MAX_SHMAPPN){
00130                 return NULL;
00131         }
00132         
00133         ++shMemories[shmid].appnProcessesAmm;
00134         for (i = 0 ; i < MAX_SHMAPPN ; ++i){
00135                 if (shMemories[shmid].appnProcessesPids[i] == -1){
00136                         shMemories[shmid].appnProcessesPids[i] = pid;
00137                         break;
00138                 }
00139         }
00140         if (i == MAX_SHMAPPN){
00141                 return NULL;
00142         }
00143         
00144         *semid = shMemories[shmid].semid;
00145         
00146         return (char *)shMemories[shmid].shMemP;
00147 }
00148 
00149 int _sys_shm_detach(int shmid){
00150         int i;
00151         pid_t pid;
00152         
00153         pid = getpid();
00154         if (shmid < 0 || shmid >= MAX_SHMEMS){
00155                 return -1;
00156         }
00157         
00158         for (i = 0 ; i < MAX_SHMAPPN ; ++i){
00159                 if (shMemories[shmid].appnProcessesPids[i] == pid){
00160                         shMemories[shmid].appnProcessesPids[i] = -1;
00161                         --shMemories[shmid].appnProcessesAmm;
00162                         break;
00163                 }
00164         }
00165         if (i == MAX_SHMAPPN){
00166                 return -1;
00167         }
00168         if (!(shMemories[shmid].appnProcessesAmm)){
00169                 shmDestroy(shmid);
00170         }
00171         
00172         return shMemories[shmid].appnProcessesAmm;
00173 }
